1.0.0.name: wordpress/autofill-cf7-bb
1.0.0.description:
autofill-CF7-BB let you autofill contact form 7 fields (input text, radio, select, checkboxes, textarea) with url GET variables. It add a shortcode to write in the "contact form 7 template editor" for each field. For drop down menu fields and radio/checkboxes you can specify wether you would select it by Id (from 0) or by value. You can also populate each field with new values from URL Get var, or replace firstly defined values.

Requirements PHP 5+ (use Simple HTML Dom from Jose Solorzano)

No javascript (excpet for option page...)
